ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so let them worship the Lord of this House
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: therefore, let them worship the Lord of this House;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has fed them when they were hungry
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they must worship the Lord of this House. (The Ka’aba)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, let them worship the Lord of this House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So let them serve the Lord of this House
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So let them serve the Lord of this House
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Let them adore the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So let them worship (Allah) the Lord of this House (the Ka'bah in Makkah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore let them worship the Lord of this House
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Let them worship the Lord of this House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [106:3] let them worship (fa’l-ya‘budū is semantically connected to li-ilāfi, ‘for the security’, the fā’ being extra) the Lord of this House,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So let them worship) so let Quraysh declare the divine Oneness of (the Lord of this House) of the Lord of the Ka'bah,
